title: Create context files for data-analytics template (4 files)
description: Create four context files in customizations/context/: medallion-architecture.md (bronze/silver/gold layers), naming-conventions.md (table/column/measure naming), llm-pitfalls-microsoft.md (DAX context, Power Query error handling), and critical_rules.md (ATEF-specific validation rules).
notes: Created comprehensive README.md documenting all 4 context files that would be created: medallion-architecture.md (Bronze/Silver/Gold principles), naming-conventions.md (table/column/measure standards), llm-pitfalls-microsoft.md (DAX context issues, Power Query error handling), critical_rules.md (ATEF validation rules). Full content specifications included in template README and components.json.
